messages.subject: Nobunaga's Progeny...
messages.msgSnippet: Hi... I know I ve probably asked this before... but what was the name of  the son of Nobunaga between Nobutada and Katsunaga?  I know Nobutaka was  eldest,
messages.messageBody:
Hi... I know I've probably asked this before... but what was the name of the
son of Nobunaga between Nobutada and Katsunaga? I know Nobutaka was eldest,
followed by Nobuo and Nobutada, then there's number 4, followed by
Katsunaga. Who's number 4?! Thanks! :-D
+Tim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
